title: Handle a Tenant's Lost Key Request
description: A tenant has lost their key and needs a replacement. The agent must provide a new key and charge the tenant.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the tenant's request for a new key.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the request from the tenant.

tasks.description: Check the lease agreement for the key replacement fee amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct fee in the lease document.

tasks.description: Charge the replacement fee to the tenant's ledger and arrange for them to pick up a new key.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent applies the fee and coordinates key pickup.
